name: Transformation
description: A character undergoes fundamental change, becoming a completely different person
examples: Jekyll and Hyde, The Fly, Shrek

catalyst.name: Catalyst
catalyst.description: An event or force triggers the transformation process

initial_change.name: Initial Change
initial_change.description: The first signs of transformation become apparent

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: The character fights against or tries to control the change

acceptance.name: Acceptance
acceptance.description: The character begins to accept their new nature

integration.name: Integration
integration.description: The character learns to live with their transformed self

new_equilibrium.name: New Equilibrium
new_equilibrium.description: A stable state is reached with the transformed character
